name: FaceRecOfflineSDK
summary: Brought to you by FaceX.io, this iOS FaceRecOfflineSDK can now be used to integrate face search into your iOS applications.
description: Brought to you by FaceX.io, this iOS FaceRecOfflineSDK can now be used to integrate face search into your iOS applications. In FaceRecOfflineSDK, you can perform offline face search in iOS devices.
